ai.summary: A gentle 5.7 km loop named Botley Health Routes - Light Blue in the UK. Designed for beginners and casual walkers, it offers an easy, health-focused outing along mostly flat paths.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with gentle gradients, combining paved paths and compact trails. Surfaces are generally easy to walk, with occasional grass sections.
ai.safety_notes: Carry sufficient water and wear comfortable footwear. Check the forecast and weather conditions before you go. Stay on marked paths, be aware of other pedestrians and cyclists, and carry a map or GPS in case of detours. Phone reception may vary in rural areas, so share your route with someone and have a backup plan.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn; winter can be cold, wet, and muddy.

seo.title: Botley Health Routes - Light Blue | Easy 5.7 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover Botley Health Routes - Light Blue, an easy 5.7 km hike in the UK. Flat to gentle paths, beginner-friendly with practical safety tips and gear.
